column3: “Picked up an 1/8th at Bloom because they didn't have the strain I wanted originally. This strain is KILLER! The Blueberry influences are heavy as you can tell by how the nugs smell. Strong smell of Blueberries, even through a glass nug jar. The smoke was smooth and expansive and a strong blueberry aroma on the exhale. The Diesel lineage is noticeable by the strong sativa effects. The body high becomes noticeable abou...”

“Took me 27 yrs to try weed. Been trying as many different strains as I can get my hands on basically nonstop for the past 7 months. That being said; blueberry diesel is one of my favorites. Potent head high that seems to last a good amount of time, along with a nice body high. Definitely smoke too much, and it's gunna leave u stuck" and feeling a bit lethargic. Gave me the munchies heavy! Nice

“This strain is extremely wild! I dropped into a separate dimension, and forgot where I was. Mild body high, consisting of cold chrystals forming under the skin. Everything felt like an adventure. Very very fun strain!”

“I loved the way this made me feel. It put me straight in a feel good" mood. It's the perfect blend of head and body high. I blasted some jazzy-euphoric type music while I enjoyed this blunt. It just makes you feel at ease. I consider myself a light smoker and I'm usually done with 2-3 good pulls but with this
column4: I smoked about half of the cone. I did take it slow though
column5: because I was warned of how strong it can be if...”"

column3:
“Blueberry x Sour Diesel. 
Strong Blueberry Smell, fresh 
Effects tend to be happy and relaxing 
but not too overwhelming.

Exactly that, if you're looking for a perfect cross blend with good flavor and aroma, it's perfect!”

“fantastic. always gives me and my buddies the best high we ever had. i love this strain with my heart and it never dissapoints. by far one of the best pots out there, you must try💚  using it rn and it is the giggliest shit ever, shit makes your stomach hurt bc of too much laughter. ITS DANK! Whoever created this strain, please let me cruise 🕯 makes you so high and happy so quick, you don't have use as much bc it is...”

“one of my new favorites. small amount gets you very giggly and euphoric with a burst of energy. the initial energy mellows down into a smooth relaxation that's not sedating. good for a social smoke or to wind down from anxiety/stress. watch out for munchies though.”
“i have never had munchies this crazy before in my entire life, you will eat everything and it will taste amazing.  Also you'll probably fall asleep after a little bit, but in a calm relaxed state.”
“This shit got me baked!”

“one of my new favorites. small amount gets you very giggly and euphoric with a burst of energy. the initial energy mellows down into a smooth relaxation that's not sedating. good for a social smoke or to wind down from anxiety/stress. watch out for munchies though.”

“Great berry flavor for sure. Fairly smooth smoke. High is heady and pleasant. Medicinally, it works great! Exactly what Leafly statistics state it does. I only didn't give this a 5 because, although the smoke was fairly smooth, it still had a sharpness to it. I've only smoked this through a pipe as well. Overall great smoke and would definitely get it again.”
“Taste & Smells like blueberries with a lil kick of diesel. Great for relaxing after a hard day of work.”
“Great Bud mate definitely offer to some lads in Sydney, Australia 🙌👌”
“good long high. Felt no pain, was very aroused. Excellent strain.”

“The blueberry element is killer in this strain from the way it smells!  One of my top favorite strains!  Gave me a great feeling made the music just come alive and really pop.  Overall great head high with a nice body high.”

“I needed a good strain for pain relief so I tried this and I was very happy to be able to forget about my pain for awhile. It worked. Like taking a big fat muscle relaxer but safe. AZ Organix never disappoints. Always high quality and excellent   and compassionate customer service.”
“When I smoked this new strand of marijuana, by golly I was, what the people in the the biz refer to, as high". Gosh darn-it I was so ecstatic that I called Constance down
column4: and said that she should partake in this glorious cannabis.”"

column3: “Strong strain even for an avid smoker. Smells like the blueberry, tastes like sour diesel. Great relaxed high for an afternoon in or a day at the park. Still a fairly clear head high but super chill body high. Awesome strain.”

“Nv pure blueberry diesel. 21% thc 

Appearance: dense bud structure and light green and bright orange hairs. 

Smell: the scent is very fruity and pungent.  it smells like a blueberry strain with just a hint of that diesel scent to it 

Taste:The taste is very sweet and leaves a nice after taste on exhale and on  a dry pull from a clean pipe or joint it taste similar  to how it smells 

Effect : it comes on quickly i...”
“flavorful and very relaxing. great for uplifting your mood.”

“Wow! It's hard to find a good NYC sour d anymore, but this is close! A high potency sativa, BBSD has a strong smell of diesel/gas combined with blueberry. A cross between crows pleasers blueberry and NY Sour D, the buds are sticky, dense, coated in crystals, and highly potent smelling. The smoke is smooth, the high is energetic, but not paranoid, and will leave you wanting to go on a run, then eat a lot of food. Help...”
“Pretty decent strain. This strain reminds me alot of Blue Dream except slightly more indica. It has a nice blueberry smell and taste. Great anytime use strain for relaxation.”

“I use marijuana for my insomnia and headaches, and I have to say this is one of my new favorite strains. The high is very relaxed, calm and mellow. Can definitely feel it very powerfully in the head and behind the eyes. I strongly recommend it for headaches and migraines.”

“I love this strain. 

This came from an indoor grower.  The giveaway is the density of the flower.  CO2 is the only thing that will make a flower that dense.

This flower has a wonderful bouquet, has not been keefed, and is cured perfectly.

The trim was nice and tight the way I like it as well.”
“Pretty decent strain. This strain reminds me alot of Blue Dream except slightly more indica. It has a nice blueberry smell and taste. Great anytime use strain for relaxation.”

“very strong hits but doesn't last long. super sweet and smooth can defiantly taste blueberry and berry. a nice body high with uplifting euphoric feeling. super hungry after. slow fade out and sleepy after.”

“Vaped as pure oil from a vape pen. Tastes bright and fruity, with a hint of green. High is bright and uplifting, like a good cup of coffee. Good for hanging out and having a stimulating conversation. A very social high.”

“I use marijuana for my insomnia and headaches, and I have to say this is one of my new favorite strains. The high is very relaxed, calm and mellow. Can definitely feel it very powerfully in the head and behind the eyes. I strongly recommend it for headaches and migraines.”

“THE ABOVE TOP SHELF IS BEST TO DESCRIBE THESE MEDS FROM J THERE!
Service is the absolute best for delivery as well , never been disappointed with them.Get it from EZ MEDS its the variety I needed!!”

“A personal favorite -Blueberry Diesel is all about that sweet blueberry flavor, which comes through nicely whether in bud or concentrate form. One of the best pure flavor strains I've tried.
As for effect, expect a high that comes on slow but sets in well, doesn't knock you down too hard, though it will set your sails for chill-world. 
It seems to be an even mixture of sativa and indica-type qualities; nice, upliftin...”

“I love this strain. 

This came from an indoor grower.  The giveaway is the density of the flower.  CO2 is the only thing that will make a flower that dense.

This flower has a wonderful bouquet, has not been keefed, and is cured perfectly.

The trim was nice and tight the way I like it as well.”
“berry good”

“Wow! It's hard to find a good NYC sour d anymore, but this is close! A high potency sativa, BBSD has a strong smell of diesel/gas combined with blueberry. A cross between crows pleasers blueberry and NY Sour D, the buds are sticky, dense, coated in crystals, and highly potent smelling. The smoke is smooth, the high is energetic, but not paranoid, and will leave you wanting to go on a run, then eat a lot of food. Help...”

“This is becoming one of my favorite strains. Blueberry Diesel is a great hybrid for a day inside. Its' sativa side is prevalent, but not overwhelming, it is a nice calm head high. The Indica side is also equally prevalent and not understated; it has a powerful body high that gives significant pain and anxiety relief.”

“I use marijuana for my insomnia and headaches, and I have to say this is one of my new favorite strains. The high is very relaxed, calm and mellow. Can definitely feel it very powerfully in the head and behind the eyes. I strongly recommend it for headaches and migraines.”

“A personal favorite -Blueberry Diesel is all about that sweet blueberry flavor, which comes through nicely whether in bud or concentrate form. One of the best pure flavor strains I've tried.
As for effect, expect a high that comes on slow but sets in well, doesn't knock you down too hard, though it will set your sails for chill-world. 
It seems to be an even mixture of sativa and indica-type qualities; nice, upliftin...”
“Strength was very mild, with only a light clear sativa affect.”
“perfect strain,0 lack of energy, 0 couch lock ,plenty of uplifting vibes,Good strain if you anxiety and have to get things done or be in a social setting”
“Great fruity taste like blueberries and real smooth”
“Gets you plain old ripped. Not much in the way of nuance and/or fucking-around with this one. Solid-average Colorado dope.”
“Excellent strain. Great body high, perfect cerebral high.”

“Great strain, in love the way that the sour diesel smell is pungent on the dark greenish purple dank blueberry nuggetry. This cannabis flower batch smells heavenly and gets you wrecked. I can't move, or at least dont want to. This is the best looking smelling and priced bud I have seen in a while, great dispensary”

“I suffer from really bad anxiety (GAD/PD) and I find it incredibly relaxing. I panic briefly when I first start to feel it, but it keeps me from going completely into panic mode which is great. After that when I stop having the intense body high I just feel incredibly at peace and relaxed. It also make my boyfriend really interested in sex which I can't complain about.”
“Gets you plain old ripped. Not much in the way of nuance and/or fucking-around with this one. Solid-average Colorado dope.”
“incredible flavor and strength”
“Great fruity taste like blueberries and real smooth”

“Was lacking the blueberry/diesel smell but that was it. It was bright and dripping in trichomes. My fingers are sticky and covered in trichomes after breaking it up. It smokes nice and smooth. 

Great for daytime vibing!”

“just got this stuff.  I have seizures, anxiety, and depression. it helps calm my body and mind down. very relaxing, makes you hungry, also you can smoke it during the daytime and get stuff done, but don't smoke too much or it will lay u flat on ur ass. helps you sleep most definetly. very good stuff.”
“lOVE IT A LITTLE HARSH IF MIXED W/OTHER STRAINS BUT BOY DOES IT DO IT'S JOB tHATS FOR SURE”

“Great strain, in love the way that the sour diesel smell is pungent on the dark greenish purple dank blueberry nuggetry. This cannabis flower batch smells heavenly and gets you wrecked. I can't move, or at least dont want to. This is the best looking smelling and priced bud I have seen in a while, great dispensary”

“Was lacking the blueberry/diesel smell but that was it. It was bright and dripping in trichomes. My fingers are sticky and covered in trichomes after breaking it up. It smokes nice and smooth. 

Great for daytime vibing!”

“just got this stuff.  I have seizures, anxiety, and depression. it helps calm my body and mind down. very relaxing, makes you hungry, also you can smoke it during the daytime and get stuff done, but don't smoke too much or it will lay u flat on ur ass. helps you sleep most definetly. very good stuff.”
“Great fruity taste like blueberries and real smooth”

“Definitely one of my favorites. . The smell alone is addictive and it breaks up beautifully I feel you won't go through it as fast because of that and not to mention is strong. I definitely recommend this heavenly flower.”
“Excellent strain. Great body high, perfect cerebral high.”
“Great fruity taste like blueberries and real smooth”

“just got this stuff.  I have seizures, anxiety, and depression. it helps calm my body and mind down. very relaxing, makes you hungry, also you can smoke it during the daytime and get stuff done, but don't smoke too much or it will lay u flat on ur ass. helps you sleep most definetly. very good stuff.”
“Gets you plain old ripped. Not much in the way of nuance and/or fucking-around with this one. Solid-average Colorado dope.”

“This strain in my opinion is very good for smoking when you get off work and you just wanna relax. With it's perfect half and half giving you both a body high and head high. You'll just feel so amazing and uplifted and relaxed and that's what everyone's is looking for.”

“Two of my favorite strains had a baby. Unfortunately, the batch I had aquired from The Source in Las Vegas was not good. Bud had absolutely no smell or taste when vaporizing. Not sure why this is in their superior" price category.”"
“Absolutely amazing, one of my favorite strains!”
“I found that it came on strong , and then faded to a very relaxed and happy feeling. A little goes a long way !”

“The smell of this strain is why I bought it. It's aroma is so yummy. However, I gave this strain a lower rating because it did not get me high. Disappointed, confused if my tolerance is just to high, or if I expected an influence other than just being clear heading and mildly relaxed. If you are sensitive to anxiety and have a lower tolerance and just want something to make you chill, then this could work for you.”
“awesome! top 10”
“chill.”
“4.5/5 best tasting Diesel I've ever smoked. Very pretty buds coated in trics nice 60/40 sativa Dom!”
“Awesome strain .. delicious , the High was instant , long lasting high .”

“Okay so i am a everyday smoker have tried multibly strains & i personoly love this sweet berry strain, have not tryed tho bud but im smoking a TKO 1000mg vape of it and it is bomb.com good body buzz with giggles and funny tingles. Mild head high along with the light linge of the disel. Highly recomend #5 on my top 10 forsure!”
“Not too much anxiety👍🏻 Could sit and stare at the ceiling and think of tonz of things at once. Very creative. Feeling dumb and slow though.”
“Smells incredible not a strong buzz but enjoyable seems like perfect balance of sativa and indica.”

“Sweet BlueBerry Diesel. Where do we begin? As im vaping this in VVS oil im impressed. Amazing blueberry taste. As a past smoker of Blueberry and Sour diesel this love child is a 10/10. Europhic. These munchies though..look out👀🦍. highly reccommend.”
“It was a very good strain the taste was good a little sweet taste to it was smooth. It was a very good time and it hit almost right away .”

“My buddy on the East Coast told me to look out for blackberry diesel well I screwed up and got Blueberry Diesel from Cowlitz Gold. I have no complaints I'm a heavy every day smoker and I was impressed. Both in flavor and good uplifting high. I tried to give it 4.5 stars.”

“My favorite hybrid to date (my favorite strain overall). I smoke vapes. The blueberry flavor is tasty. I love the smooth head high this strain gives from the sativa (Sour Diesel) and the relaxing body high this gives from the Indica (Blueberry OG). A true hybrid. Very smooth high.”
“Spend lots of time in maine so i favor blueberry”
“Really nice smoke, the  effects I shared were a happy euphoria, depression lifted, hunger definitely, music sounds amazing, arousal. Very enjoyable! Turned my day around completely!”
“Probably one of my new favorites. I have bad anxiety but any of the diesel kinds don't raise it. A very happy, silly high.”
“One of my favorite strains recently. Sometimes I'll mix it with Blue Dream depending on my plans at the time.”
“Only dabbed as Shatter, but it’s a nice dab really good blueberry hashy taste. Not overpowering at all, a very mellow but pleasant high. Good for socialising.”
“Only dabbed as Shatter, but it’s a nice dab really good blueberry hashy taste. Not overpowering at all, a very mellow but pleasant high. Good for socialising.”
“Very good head high. enough to give you a great buzz but not bog you down for the rest of the day. very good compact buds I was super happy and impressed!”

“This strain is unbelievable. Bbd makes you feel like your dipping your body in a bath of honey.. A good strain to try when you want to play some video games, or chill with some friends. Using this with the Pax especially with the Flavor setting on makes the strain 10x better. You can definitely taste the diesel and that small bit of blueberry for more advanced palettes. Very smooth smoke. Def recommend”
“First time and have to say this is pretty solid. Needed some uplifting and this one is delivering.”

“loved this strain ,helped me sleep so good have a very hard time sleeping and just was one of the best head highs IV had in a bit I love my indica but this strain is so relaxing and a beautiful looking plant from the budz ,to the smell of berry hint of Diesel it's just a must if your able to get some grab it up”
“asked how much the tax be on an 8th she said $ 45.00”

“I really like this strain. It definitely uplifts my
 mood and makes me feel euphoric.”

“loved this strain ,helped me sleep so good have a very hard time sleeping and just was one of the best head highs IV had in a bit I love my indica but this strain is so relaxing and a beautiful looking plant from the budz ,to the smell of berry hint of Diesel it's just a must if your able to get some grab it up”

“Great body high without losing the heady sativa feeling. Very relaxing - good for that space when you're winding down with late-night TV but don't want to pass out on the couch. The taste and smell do justice to both lineage strains, providing a complicated flavor to a mellow experience.”

“I love this strain, but who wouldn't. Combining Sour Diesel and Blueberry is a perfect combo of one of your best Sativas and Indicas into some sort of ganja dream child. Definitely more of an Indica stone for me with just enough head high to keep you off the couch and more likely on a lawn/beach chair Lol”
“Blazin' and amazin' ! Luv the relaxation!Good medicine for stress and pain melt.Creative,mind -expanding mellow calm.Relax and float down stream!”

 mood and makes me feel euphoric.”

“It was friuty, with that diesel burn.. a good mix of two great strains.tasty.”

“Good head high, body relaxed but not couch struck. Your focused and aware but fully relaxed. Taste starts with smooth citrus blueberry and finishes of taste of sour diesel we all love. Good for a chill night in or out for a bite to eat.”
“Great combo of sweet and sour.  the smell is first blue then diesel. very relaxing”
“Great all day. Motivated lift. Best deese strain in my opinion.”
“good smoke,but i built up a tolerance pretty quick.kick-ass high though!”
“love the bluesclues taste... very bluberry”
“Fantastic flavor, great for relaxing.  It doesn't floor you thanks to the diesel mix, but best use to zone out.  Well balance for a hybrid.”

“Zen healing always has the best quality and each strain is the strain unlike some places who says this is og etc... But they r not what they say. Not zen healing they have QUALITY FOR GREAT PRICES.... THIS MEDICINE WAS DANK ESPECIALLY FOR ANXIETY I FELT SO HAPPY N RELAXED. BUT NOT SLEEPY RELAXED. MUST TRY ..... :)”

“This strain is AMAZING! it tastes just like Blueberry (I also wrapped it in Grape Swisher Sweets), but gives me the same mellow, relaxed feel of Sour Diesel. Sour D. usually makes me body feel limp, relaxed, and tingly. I also know it's loud because everything around me just seems louder (literally lol) and I had the giggles, but not too much. Overall I would give this a 10/10. One of my top 5 if not my favorite yet....”

“Sweet tasting bud with a hint of diesel 


Kept me talkative and happy 

It's a strain where you can find yourself smoking a lot of it trying to pull out all the effects but it keeps you right where you are so don't reach for the stars .. 

Smoke it .. Enjoy it .. Put it down and let the body do its thing lol 

B+ strain”
“Great smell, ok flavor. The important part is that it got me pretty high!”
“tastes great and is smooth, makes my body feel great and actually gives me energy. I do yard work in 100+ degree heat after smoking this and the heat doesn't even phase me”

“Got a free gram of this stuff the first time I visited RC. Very generous of them because this stuff is good. Blueberry" because it smells and tastes fruity with a blue tint to the buds. Diesel because it's strong on the sativa end that lifts you up and gives you some energy. A good clean smoke that's good for pain and stress
“Super tasty berry aroma! Gave me a very focused and relaxed high... Heavy hitting but able to function. Good pick”
“Just amazing my #1 favorite By far”
“This is my day time go to. It numbs the pain but still allows you to go on with your daily activities.”
“Easy to smoke great smell and taste and potency as well got it from bloom they are always pretty good”
“most definite top ten when grown right”
“Tastes just like blueberry lol smells pretty good as well”

“very nice. strong. has a sour taste after taking a hit but later on you feel rhe blueberry. nice high. not foggy in the morning. i recommend to medical and smoker alike. but not a strain for new smokers.”
“It tastes and smells great. I only took off one star since it makes me +uncontrollably+ hungry. Always next level munchies, every time.”

“Great strain but not as impressive as most diesels I've had before. 
Light uplifting high that makes you wanna smile and converse :)
We tried this out in oil form on a new dab pen we just purchased! Great taste but very mild.”
“Yes, in my top ten. Smiling, and not giving a care. Great high. Nice happy mental high. Body was relaxed but not in the couch. Another one added to my go to hybrid.”
“Pairs well with doing housework with some tunes in the background.”
“you can smell a light blueberry smell, with a powerful smell of sour dissel, vert uplifted and energetic”
“Great taste and smell. I can't get enough of it.”

“One of my favorite strains. Pretty balanced overall but has an incredible sensation enhancing buzz that i have not found with any other strain. Its a pretty incredible experience and highly recommended for everyone to try. An added benefit is he incredible blueberry scent that this strain inherits from
Its blueberry parent.”
“Best tasting strain I’ve had in my life. This strain with a blueberry zig makes my mouth water bro. So good. So blueberry.”
“One of my favorite strains to use when I'm out with friends”

“My favorite hybrid to date (my favorite strain overall). I smoke vapes. The blueberry flavor is tasty. I love the smooth head high this strain gives from the sativa (Sour Diesel) and the relaxing body high this gives from the Indica (Blueberry OG). A true hybrid. Very smooth high.”

“Okay so i am a everyday smoker have tried multibly strains & i personoly love this sweet berry strain, have not tryed tho bud but im smoking a TKO 1000mg vape of it and it is bomb.com good body buzz with giggles and funny tingles. Mild head high along with the light linge of the disel. Highly recomend #5 on my top 10 forsure!”

“For the price? This strain certainly does the trick. It's been the ONLY strain I could afford all week, and I must say I am still rather impressed with it. I do think it tastes a bit rough, and the high is delightful, yet takes a bit more to reach where I normally want to be creativity-wise. Over-all? Good strain, well worth the purchase if money is tight.”

“I actually don’t like the taste of this strain much at all. It’s too harsh and all I get is a tart, gassy flavor. 
What I do like is how slow and low the high is. A couple hours after taking a few hits, I still felt great - classical music was invigorating, and my senses were still on alert.”
“I thought it was supposed to lean towards Indica.  It felt like a sativa, but a mild one at that.  Light head high with a slight berry flavor via vaping.”
“Only dabbed as Shatter, but it’s a nice dab really good blueberry hashy taste. Not overpowering at all, a very mellow but pleasant high. Good for socialising.”

“My buddy on the East Coast told me to look out for blackberry diesel well I screwed up and got Blueberry Diesel from Cowlitz Gold. I have no complaints I'm a heavy every day smoker and I was impressed. Both in flavor and good uplifting high. I tried to give it 4.5 stars.”
“Smells incredible not a strong buzz but enjoyable seems like perfect balance of sativa and indica.”
“Awesome strain .. delicious , the High was instant , long lasting high .”
“4.5/5 best tasting Diesel I've ever smoked. Very pretty buds coated in trics nice 60/40 sativa Dom!”

“Got blueberry diesel by lucky devil and was excited to try it because of the lineage. The look is good. Very frosty, dripping trich. Greenish beige nugs with minimal small orange hairs. Smells off from expectation. The aroma is like beef jerky. Very spicy and slightly sweet. Smoke is heavy and expands quick. Good long cough. Effect is good at first. Very happy, talkative, and slightly relaxed. Then it fades into a he...”
“One of my favorite strains recently. Sometimes I'll mix it with Blue Dream depending on my plans at the time.”
“Probably one of my new favorites. I have bad anxiety but any of the diesel kinds don't raise it. A very happy, silly high.”
“It was a very good strain the taste was good a little sweet taste to it was smooth. It was a very good time and it hit almost right away .”

“Sweet BlueBerry Diesel. Where do we begin? As im vaping this in VVS oil im impressed. Amazing blueberry taste. As a past smoker of Blueberry and Sour diesel this love child is a 10/10. Europhic. These munchies though..look out👀🦍. highly reccommend.”
“Not too much anxiety👍🏻 Could sit and stare at the ceiling and think of tonz of things at once. Very creative. Feeling dumb and slow though.”

“The smell of this strain is why I bought it. It's aroma is so yummy. However, I gave this strain a lower rating because it did not get me high. Disappointed, confused if my tolerance is just to high, or if I expected an influence other than just being clear heading and mildly relaxed. If you are sensitive to anxiety and have a lower tolerance and just want something to make you chill, then this could work for you.”
“adderal of weed”

“Strong diesel smell with a hint of blueberries. This is a very good strain with a balanced head and body high. I have found it useful before going to the gym. Helps greatly with stomach pain related to IBS as well.”

“While I'm not actually a huge fan of DJ Short's Blueberry (it's not heavy enough for me) I absolutely love Blueberry Diesel. For being a 60% Indica I get more if an even high from it. For me both the head and body high cone on at the same time and it's never overwhelming in any way. The high is a very relaxing and soothing one, what with the Blueberry body high and the stress destroying Sour D head high. If you've ev...”
“This strain is overall pretty good not overwhelming just a nice cool medium great for some Fortnite or Netflix cool high not gonna lie.”
“Nice n heady tasty too”

“loved this strain ,helped me sleep so good have a very hard time sleeping and just was one of the best head highs IV had in a bit I love my indica but this strain is so relaxing and a beautiful looking plant from the budz ,to the smell of berry hint of Diesel it's just a must if your able to get some grab it up”
“Really nice smoke, the  effects I shared were a happy euphoria, depression lifted, hunger definitely, music sounds amazing, arousal. Very enjoyable! Turned my day around completely!”
“chill.”
“awesome! top 10”
“I found that it came on strong , and then faded to a very relaxed and happy feeling. A little goes a long way !”
“Absolutely amazing, one of my favorite strains!”

“The Sour Diesel Blueberry from Advanced Farm and Garden in Ypsilanti is 100% organic; as is all their strains. The diesel smell was not as strong, nor the blueberry, as its respective parents, respectively, but rather it had a happy marriage of the two. Sweet blueberry scent, with a touch of citrus, finishing with the signature Sour D taste. Dense clouds via the vape 6 tokes deep; and the burn is sweet and smooth to ...”

“Gorgeous emerald green buds cascaded in fiery orange hairs. This strain has a beautiful aroma with a nice piney base and a hint of citrus (sour blueberries) in the background. Great functioning day weed, portion is everything like with anything but nice clean high. Personally this one helps me with my ADHD.”
“This strain is absolutely lovely for an upset tummy or a bad day. It was a very consistent high for me, strong and steady all the way.”
“Enjoyed how relax this makes you feel, but you aren't couch ridden for hours. One of my favorite strains.”
“Really nice nuggets that weren't harsh at all. Great head buzz with a calm body affect. I give it an A+ because it went far and beyond what it's for.”

“This strain is a Very Strong & Sweet Indica Hybrid.
The Blueberry Tastes and Scents are by far the Star of this strain. Both Outdoor or under artificial lighting, this strain stands out as Something Special.”
“this strain gets me paranoid sometimes, but other than that, it's one of the best strains I've smoked”
“smells better than its effects”
“Great blueberry smell, excellent taste.   Strong high and very relaxing.”

“Blueberry Diesel is an amazing strain. The smell and taste are more blueberryish than the actual blueberry strain, with just a hint of diesel. The nugs were long and conic, with green,red, and some blue/purp here and there. Lots of milky trichs. The high was  hard to pinpoint. Sometimes feeling balanced and some times leaning towards the body.”

“I really like this strain. It definitely uplifts my
 mood and makes me feel euphoric.”
“asked how much the tax be on an 8th she said $ 45.00”
“First time and have to say this is pretty solid. Needed some uplifting and this one is delivering.”

“This strain is unbelievable. Bbd makes you feel like your dipping your body in a bath of honey.. A good strain to try when you want to play some video games, or chill with some friends. Using this with the Pax especially with the Flavor setting on makes the strain 10x better. You can definitely taste the diesel and that small bit of blueberry for more advanced palettes. Very smooth smoke. Def recommend”
“Very good head high. enough to give you a great buzz but not bog you down for the rest of the day. very good compact buds I was super happy and impressed!”
“very sweet yet punchy taste smoother than a diesel and as sweet and aromatic as pure blueberry”
“Too strong for me. Can't really smoke it unless I don't want to get anything done. Makes it hard to focus.”

“This is a lovely strain! There is a lovely fruity flavor and a pleasing, but pungent, aroma. I find that I feel pretty calm and relaxed mentally and physically. For me, it isn't as strong on the physical relaxation as I would like, but it does definitely take the edge off and a bit more.  : ) If you are about to have a bit of this lovely smoke, Enjoy! You won't be let down. :)”

“Great body high without losing the heady sativa feeling. Very relaxing - good for that space when you're winding down with late-night TV but don't want to pass out on the couch. The taste and smell do justice to both lineage strains, providing a complicated flavor to a mellow experience.”

“I love this strain, but who wouldn't. Combining Sour Diesel and Blueberry is a perfect combo of one of your best Sativas and Indicas into some sort of ganja dream child. Definitely more of an Indica stone for me with just enough head high to keep you off the couch and more likely on a lawn/beach chair Lol”
“Blazin' and amazin' ! Luv the relaxation!Good medicine for stress and pain melt.Creative,mind -expanding mellow calm.Relax and float down stream!”
“Strong taste, heavy high. Highly recommended.”

“very nice. strong. has a sour taste after taking a hit but later on you feel rhe blueberry. nice high. not foggy in the morning. i recommend to medical and smoker alike. but not a strain for new smokers.”
“One of the dopest, tastiest and most euphoric chill vibes I've ever smoked.”
“Clean, fragrant,  nice high”
“Very wonderful taste.  Left me feeling very happy, and euphoric. Buds were big, dense ,and packed full of crystals.”
“Great daytime high. Alleviates my headaches while giving me energy to get things done around the house.”
“This strain has a fruity particular taste and I like very much reminds me of blueberry muffins”
“Tastes AWESOME”
“great taste smell and smoke love this strain for skateboarding it gets me into my zone and tell about focus that's exactly the kind of weed I like.. smoke up everyone”

“It was great all in all, i live with ptsd and i enjoy a sativa hybrid at times but i get much relief from Blueberry strain so i thought its worth trying. Well it was really on the full body side just very mild, stimulating mildly, with a little uphoria. Relaxing we'll say. well balanced for an anxious person or walkin the dog.  The effects last 1-2 hours tops. Id buy it again.”

“Light high, feeling indica effects. First time trying this diesel and we normally always love diesel strains! Do enjoy this one but not as impressive as expected. 
THC is supposed to come in at 71.99% but I feel as if we're more in the 50 range. 
Like I said before decent high but not as impressive as normal diesels.”
“This is a different hybrid. Very smooth and tasty. You can either relax or be creative. Yummy a must have in your stash”
“blueberry diesel is must try of course. A comfortable high. I was relaxed and tranquil from start to finish the come down is nice and easy”
“pleasent A Must try”
“This is the best strain I personally llke to smoke, and it keeps me on top of my game.”
“Very sweet and very good for mornings!”

“Great strain that I picked up a Bloom in Phoenix AZ. I like the taste of the blueberry and the hint of diesel. The buzz was great for day time and playing battlefield 4 (PC). “Great strain a hint of blueberry smell, and a bit of diesel, feeling happy, a bit more social, relaxed.”

“Had no knowledge of this strain. Dense, tight buds loaded with trichromatic & a light blueberry aroma. Loaded my vape with a moderately tight pack & pulled 2 good rips at 410. In any case, there was none of either. I settled in & bega...”
“Spend lots of time in maine so i favor blueberry”
“Doesn't grind well untill it's crispy crisp”

That being said, and adding to it that everybody is different, this strain is very good but not one of my favorites.  In terms of the buzz, it's good and it's not overpowering which makes it a good daytime weed for heavy smokers.  If it were le...”
“Not a first pick. Made me super paranoid, and especially suffering from an anxiety disorder was the worst combination. It's an okay or good strain but for some reason it doesn't work for me.”
“First strain I've ever tried, one of my favorites”
“Very good strain didn't make me sleepy.”
“Not very diesel-y, but the flavor was out of this world and very sweet and refined. Calm and uplifting this is very nice for cleaning around the house.”
“nice clean high  a smokers high to enjoy on any time. deft will take some shit to kick this buzz  and be ready to have things repeated to you lol huh bro lol”
“Mouth watering”
“Great high that's comfortable!”

“Got me some Blue City Diesel and I hate it! Not liking the mexican swag hybrid in NYC Diesel (Mexican x Afghani - Love Afghani).

“smells good but not amazing. dense and when vape has a really good flavor. smoking gets you pretty high and always the munchies get you”
“Very relaxing and happy high. Great for stress relief and winding down.”

“I love its smell! Piney, but mild tasting. With small hits it is ok, but with big ones! Watch out .... COUGH COUGH! Great for nausea. Great for functioning throughout the day. Awesome on my pain. Would buy again. Just a great high!”
“Great strain...tastes and feel just like in the description.”
“Decided to give this strain a try and as always it didn't disappoint! Always great service here!”
“I like the all effect it gave me but it definitely gave me green over!!”
“Can't rave enough about this strain. Nice and sticky. Blueberry taste with the fuel afterburn.  Blooby Doob!”
“Very good relaxing head high. Then it levels off and you get a bit of energy and creativity going.”

“These meds I expected to be my favorite. They looked incredible and had a great smell. Upon examining, by far this was my first choice. I was a little disappointed when smoking. Don't get me wrong the meds were good, pretty potent however, I did find one seed in the gram I bought, and the taste was not as strong as I was hoping.”

“Got a free gram with a purchase. Very good, smooth taste. Blueberry flavor noticeable on exhale. Happy, feel good experience. Lasted about 1.5 hours with lingering feeling for about 5 hours. I will buy this strain in the future.”

“Buds looked good really dense, smell and taste is there, diesel taste is strong, lacks in potency, does not help with my pain, weak strain or improper grow or cure, i will try something else next time, not many sativa do it for me”
“subtle relaxation behind the eyes and calmness around me, the taste on this tho is so incredible lavender blueberry and flower profile shatter nug run”

“Average strain. Has its goods and it's not so goods. Made me feel great and active, but also made me feel anxious and rushed”
“Purchased at Light Shade Havana. This strain is A1 for me! A potential all day'er, no couch lock, alertness, smooth smoke, i.e. not harsh on the lungs, and good for circles ;-)”
“STRONG! Super rich sour blueberry taste. Couchlock!”
“Very mild, like smoking a cigarette.  Gave me a headache instead of helping.”
